amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 115-259 to appropriate $2.5 million to re-institute the Office of Technology Assessment (OTA), offset from funds from the Architect of the Capitol's Capital Construction and Operations Account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 115-259 to appropriate $2.5 million to re-institute the Office of Technology Assessment (OTA), offset from funds from the Architect of the Capitol's Capital Construction and Operations Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 236 (Roll no. 418).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 236 (Roll no. 418).
